GAnnoViz: Genomic Annotation and Visualization

Source: R/zzz-package.R
GAnnoViz-package.Rd

The GAnnoViz package provides tools for genomic annotation using sliding windows and GFF/GTF parsing.

Main Functions

  • extract_genes: Extract gene annotations from GFF/GTF.

  • extract_exons: Extract exon regions.

Utilities

  • extract_mrnas: Extract mRNA transcripts.

  • extract_cds: Extract coding sequences (CDS).

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/benben-miao/GAnnoViz

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/benben-miao/GAnnoViz/issues
